data.scheme_name: Gujarat State Biotechnology (BT) Policy 2022-27 - Incentives for Units with GFCI less than INR 200 Crores -Employment Generation Incentive (AatmaNirbhar Gujarat Rojgar Sahay) -Female -Existing
data.benefits: Scheme provides claim of up to 50% of CTC with a ceiling not exceeding Rs. 60,000 per female employee.
data.eligibility: All biotechnology units are eligible under the scheme.
data.beneficiaries: All biotechnology units are eligible under the scheme.
data.context: The main purpose of this scheme is to make Gujarat a preferred and globally competitive destination for development of biotechnology products and services
data.objective:
The main objectives of this scheme are:
To promote ecosystem strengthening projects 
To develop strategic and emerging sectors in biotechnology
To encourage sustainable living by promoting adoption of bio-technologies, biotechnology products and services
data.description:
1. Scheme provides claim of up to 50% of CTC with a ceiling not exceeding Rs. 60,000 per female employee. 
  2. The incentive will be available to the applicant for local employees that have joined the applicant/ BT Unit as a permanent/ contractual employee and has successfully completed term of 1 year. 
  3. The EGI assistance is tied to each employee and can only be claimed once for each employee in their lifetime. 
  4. Therefore, if a Unit claims this incentive for any individual employee, and thereafter the same individual employee moves to another Unit, this subsequent Unit cannot claim the EGI assistance for this employee.
data.how_to_apply: The applicant can apply from this site https://dstpolicy.gujarat.gov.in/login
data.funding_facilitator: Gujarat State Biotechnology Mission, Government of Gujarat
data.funding_mechanism: Eligible applicants will get the funds after fulfillment of given conditions
data.additional_info:
• Gross Fixed Capital Investment (GFCI):- Eligible Gross Fixed Capital Investment is to be calculated in a manner that the expenditure on buildings cannot be more than 20% of the eligible GFCI. Also, expenses towards Computers & Software, Furniture & Fixtures, Office Equipment, Vehicles, etc. (movables items) will NOT be considered towards eligible GFCI. 
  • Expansion/ Diversification:- An expansion and/or diversification implies investment carried out by a Biotechnology unit with an objective of increasing production or service capability for Biotechnology products or services with or without forward/ backward integration, in Gujarat. 
  • For computing additional GFCI, the eligible investment at the site of existing production facility where expansion/ diversification is carried out, will be considered; provided that relocation of the plants from anywhere within Gujarat will not be allowed.
data.checklist_info_a:
Industry Connect Module
Industry Connect: Organization
Request for In-principle Approval
Incorporation certificate and PAN card of applicant entity
Project brief on company letter head
copy of Promoter's PAN and Aadhar card
Format for submitting Application for availing assistance
Format for Capital Assistance, Projected Operational and Projected Supplementary Claim
Letter of Undertaking
data.checklist_info_d:

Ph. No. : 079-232-52197
Email ID : mnbtm7[at]gujarat[dot]gov[dot]in
data.beneficiary: Biotechnology Industries -Private Limited Company,Public Company,Limited Liability Partnership (LLP)- Gujarat - Small, Medium & All Non-MSMEs
